dialogues.text: TROOPERS SPROUT ARROWS in throat, legs, masks -- the targ Jake taught them, but --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE FIRING LINE aims upward, tracking the THERMAL TARGETS TRACERS rip through the foliage and --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NA'VI FALL while others retreat as bark and wood is blast off the limbs beneath their feet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NORM sprints frantically through the woods, shouting into

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jake!   Jake! We're falling back!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SURVIVING NA'VI flee the horrific onslaught.   It is a to rout.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: IN THE DRAGON, Quaritch catches glimpses of the figures streaming through the forest below.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Blue team, switch forties.   Fire at will.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Led by the Dragon, the gunships FIRE streamers of 40mm ROCKETS ahead of them. The jungle EXPLODES with HE bursts Circular SHOCK WAVES flash outward through the jungle --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: STROBOSCOPIC GLIMPSES of terrified horses rearing, Na'vi leaping, as the jungle rocks with the concussive onslaugh

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HUNTERS LOOK UP as a dark shape hovers overhead. The downblast of the VALKYRIE'S lift jets shreds the forest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: INSIDE THE SHUTTLE'S cargo bay, a row of DAISYCUTTERS are lined up. Troopers roll the first pallet down the ramp.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE PALLET falls into the jungle below and --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BA-WHOOOOOM! -- an enormous high-explosive blast rips a h hole in the forest. A white concussion wave flashes out across the ground for hundreds of meters in all direction

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AT GROUND LEVEL it is an apocalypse. Running Na'vi are blasted out of existence by fire and shock waves.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: IN THE CARGO BAY the troopers WHOOP and high-five.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah baby!     Get some!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: GROUND TROOPS ADVANCE, firing flamethrowers, AR's and GAU 90's.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quaritch's fleet flies into the shadow of the Mountain of Truth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Blue team, stay with the ground units. Red team, with me. We're punching for the main target.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quaritch glances up to see --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A squadron of WINGED SHAPES, diving out of the morning gl like birds of prey.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CLOSE ON JAKE, rushing straight down, SCREAMING a war cry he leads the charge and --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SCORES OF BANSHEES SLAM into the gunships and Samsons lik falcons hitting fat turkeys. The air battle is joined.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: JAKE'S GREAT LEONOPTERYX flairs into its signature crimso shape just before --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: K-WHAM!! -- it knocks a Scorpion tumbling. It coils aroun the gunship, slashing furiously as they spin together. JA can barely hang onto the gyrating creature.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The pilot of the Scorpion sees nothing but jaws slamming his canopy.   Jake releases the gunship and it careens in CLIFF, tearing off one rotor -- then plummets into the tr There is a satisfying FIREBALL.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SCORPIONS fall out of formation to pursue individual bans riders, FIRING cannons and rockets.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: JAKE BANKS as the cliff face next to him explodes with cannon rounds. SCREAMING down on him is another Scorpion.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: JAKE tucks and dives along the cliff, feeling the rounds splitting the air around him and --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Scorpions bank after the furiously jinking banshees a they head for cover among the floating mountains, or dive down into the trees.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DOOR GUNNERS in a SAMSON are shooting down banshees like Messerschmidts from a B-17 as --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WE FOLLOW TSU'TEY'S BANSHEE in a full delta dive. He swoo in from its blind spot and --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE GUNNERS SWIVEL too late as Tsu'tey flashes past them, SHOOTING ARROWS with deadly accuracy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A SCORPION gunship dives after a banshee. It fires an air air missile and the banshee vanishes in an EXPLOSION.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WIDE SHOT as thirty ships and hundreds of banshees wheel dive, like the Battle of Britain. Banshees are hit by gun and missiles, falling out of the sky. The occasional trai smoke and fire marks the demise of a tilt-rotor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: IN THE CENTER the Dragon is pouring out hellacious fire - tracer rounds from multiple turrets and missiles from the stub-wing pods.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NEYTIRI BANKS hard as TRACERS flash past her.   A Scorpio right on her ass as --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SHE ROLLS inverted and dives under the edge of Mons Veritatis, then rolls out, zig-zagging through the dangli vines but --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE GUNSHIP stays on her. It rips through the vines, and tracers FLASH toward us as --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SHE JINKS the banshee around a thundering waterfall but -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HER PURSUER explodes right through the curtain of water. launches an air-to-air missile. NEYTIRI jinks hard, divin The missile hits a rock outcropping, pummeling her with t shock wave.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE GUNSHIP follows her through a narrow slit between Mon Veritatis and a smaller floating island. They run this sl rolled up on their sides and --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE SCORPION GUNNER locks up Neytiri for a missile shot b

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A SHADOW crosses his canopy. Out of the sun comes a crims demon, shrieking over the roar of the turbines, and --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: K-WHAMMM!! The leonopteryx SLAMS the gunship, driving it downward in a dive. The leonopteryx lashes at it with cla and teeth as they fall together out of control.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jake kicks the gunship loose and it falls like a brick, breaking its back on a rocky promontory and EXPLODING.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FLYING WITH A SAMSON as a SECOND SAMSON falls in beside i This one has its pilot door off, and the PILOT is wearing breathing mask. The door gunners wave at --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TRUDY, her expression grim behind her mask. She holds the cyclic stick between her knees while she RAKES the other with BURSTS from an AR in her lap.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The pilot slumps over and the craft tumbles out of contro

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're not the only ones with guns, you pricks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NEYTIRI JINKS her banshee hard, an enemy Samson right beh her. The pilot is a hotdog, following her down into the trees, under the canopy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They slalom among the trunks at high speed. The gunners h half out the doors, firing. Bark and leaves explode aroun Neytiri as she zig-zags through the jungle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE BANSHEE dives under a huge tree limb, and the pilot follows. He looks up at the last second, catching a glimp of blue-skinned figures.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE HUNTERS drop a net of woven vines behind Neytiri and

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The SAMSON hits it hard. The net fouls the ship, FLIPPING backwards. It crashes upside down to the forest floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NEYTIRI'S BANSHEE is hit by GROUND-FIRE. It folds up like broken kite, crashing down through branches and --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SHE SLAMS into the ground, stunned.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: IN THE DRAGON Quaritch looks ahead, seeing the WELL OF SO He taps the pilot and points --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There it is. (into his headset) Valkyrie One, this is Dragon. Target is in sight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: IN THE CARGO BAY of Valkyrie One, the troopers ready thei deadly loads.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Target in sight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CIRCLING ABOVE, Tsu'tey falls in beside Jake, who talks t him by AIRCOM HEADSET.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We have to stop the shuttles, no matter what it takes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TSU'TEY nods. He signals, gathering other hunters, who fa in with him as he dives. Jake rolls in after them but --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A GUNSHIP drops in behind him and he is forced to evade a

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TSU'TEY LEADS the attack on the first shuttle. Hunters ji and weave through WITHERING FIRE from the escort ships.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: GUNNERS with jerry-rigged gun mounts ride the broad backs the shuttles, picking off banshees who get past the escor

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TSU'TEY is RAKED by a burst from the dorsal gunners. His mount crumples, plummeting with a dying scream and --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WE SPIRAL DOWN with him, the forest rushing up and --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A BLINDING BLIZZARD of green as he tears downward, catchi at leaves and vines. He SLAMS to the ground, badly injure

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NEARBY, ampsuits and troopers advance across the forest floor, firing their cannons and flamethrowers. The GAU-90 rip the forest to shreds.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Norm, firing as he retreats, is HIT. He collapses, his av body mortally wounded as --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HYDRAULIC FEET approach, passing the bodies of direhorses Na'vi hunters. Norm painfully tries to load another magazine, panting in fear and pain as --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AN AMPSUIT stomps up.    Aims its cannon point blank. B-B

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The top of Norm's LINK bangs open. He reels out, collapsi onto the floor, clutching himself as if he can still feel pain of death.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He sits, huddled, shivering -- crazed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TSU'TEY lies gasping, mortally injured. He looks up, grimacing, as an ampsuit looms over him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LYLE WAINFLEET reaches down and grabs Tsu'tey by his queu lifting him painfully.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I hear this is worse than death for you, chief.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WAINFLEET cuts Tsu'tey's queue off near the base. TSU'TEY SCREAMS in agony, his nervous system exploding on overloa Grinning, Lyle holds up the queue -- Tsu'tey's only connection to the world-consciousness which is his life.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NEYTIRI -- bleeding, bruised -- staggers amid burning wreckage. AMPSUIT footsteps approach and she crouches beh a tree. Troopers are seconds from seeing her as --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NEYTIRI knocks an arrow to HER FATHER'S BOW, and readies herself for a last kamikaze shot when --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE TROOPER on the far right of the firing line sees something on his screens.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Right flank -- something's coming!   It's all lit up out there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The troopers become aware of the GROUND SHAKING. A slow building thunderous ROAR and --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AN AMPSUIT comes FLYING out of the trees, cartwheeling pa them, and the SHAKING BUILDS --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mo'at opens her eyes in sudden realization as --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The troopers pivot to face --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A WALL OF CHARGING HAMMERHEADS CRASHING out of the foliag a shower of broken branches as --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE TROOPERS open fire but -- the stampede drives over th like a wave. Tree-trunk feet shatter the ampsuit cockpits Troopers are crushed or asphyxiated.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NEARBY the foot-soldiers see LIVING SHADOWS flow out of t gloom as --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VIPERWOLVES race among them with flashing jaws. The troop FIRE wildly as they go down, hitting each other as much a their attackers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The survivors break and run as more viperwolves bound out the shadows.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: JAKE BANKS, watching as HUNDREDS of rider-less WILD BANSH converge on Quaritch's ships. They literally darken the s

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the hell -- ?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The wild banshees wheel among the ships, ripping into the

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON JAKE -- slowly getting it.   EYWA is in the fight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WHOO-HOOOO!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A GUNNER fires from the door of a Samson. There is a CRAS and the head of a BANSHEE lunges in the open door, jerkin him out. Other banshees tear at the pilot's windshield.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NEYTIRI watches in awe as the ground troops scatter in disarray. The viperwolves flash past her, ignoring her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She senses something and turns slowly to see --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A THANATOR emerging from the smoke behind her. A glisteni black demon. She stands paralyzed before its stygian gaze

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -- and the thanator lowers itself, until its head is just above the ground. It holds that position -- waiting.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Trembling, she approaches the waiting demon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A smoky hell. Fires burn all around. The troopers are disorganized, falling back. Shooting at shadows. Panicked yelling fills the comm freq.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WAINFLEET and another AMPSUIT are charging together throu the smoky gloom.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A and C squads -- rally at my pos.   I want -- (screaming on the comm) Who's screaming God damn it?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We gotta get outta here! Whoever's in charge, call for extraction!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shutup you crybabies!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SOMETHING slams into the other `suit, tackling it OUT OF FRAME. Wainfleet whirls to see his squad-mate missing. He moves through a screen of foliage to reveal --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The AMPSUIT -- ripped open. Driver gone. Blood inside the cockpit. He WHIRLS at a sound in time to see --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A THANATOR LEAPING straight at him -- WAINFLEET raises hi cannon but--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WHAM!! It's on him, slamming him to the ground. The canno goes flying. He's face to face with its nightmare jaws, right outside his canopy--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On its back is NEYTIRI, and it's a toss up which one look more pissed off. The thanator rears back, muscles ripplin as it poises to strike and --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: K-KRAAACKK! Slams its teeth right through his canopy. Wainfleet's SCREAM is brief.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Neytiri's demon mount rears up and its triumphant ROAR ec through the forest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Max runs down the hall, leading the other scientists.   H yelling into an AIRCOM HANDSET --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rogue One, Rogue One, this is Max.   Tell Jake we are in motion. (to the scientists) Get in there. Barricade the door!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The door is hurled open and the SCIENTISTS charge in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Science geeks barricade the door as AVATAR-DRIVERS scramb into their link units, pulling the clamshells down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Max checks the door is secure from his side then runs dow connecting corridor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HUMAN NORM emerges from the airlock, wearing breathing ge and carrying an AR. He stumbles, dazed, toward the battle

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: JAKE SIGNALS and a formation of hunters rolls in, diving the lead shuttle, which is already besieged by winged creatures.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE CARGO RAMP is the scene of a pitched battle. Na'vi hunters hurl themselves off their mounts in waves, overwhelming the troopers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HUNTERS are shot, falling out of the ship, as others fly They shoot arrows and spears from the end of the ramp, an troopers fall back deeper into the fuselage.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The panicked CREW CHIEF slams a switch and the ramp begin close, a second before he is cut down by a spear.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: JAKE'S LEONOPTERYX plummets at the shuttle from behind. H swoops down, flairs to reduce speed, rolls off his mount lands, tumbling on the shuttle's broad back as --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: GUNNERS try to swing their guns toward him but he RAKES t with his AR, still running forward and --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: JAKE PULLS two grenades from his battle harness, yanking pins out with his teeth. He hurls them down the intakes o the VTOL turbofans as --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HIS LEONOPTERYX BANKS in a tight arc back toward him and

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HE SPRINTS ON as the grenades EXPLODE, shattering the turbines, which riddle the fuselage with shrapnel and --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: JAKE LEAPS INTO SPACE, landing on the back of his mount a reconnecting. They flap away, gaining altitude as fire BLASTS out of the bottom of the shuttle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON THE FLIGHT DECK, the pilot feels the ship dropping.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mains to a hundred percent!   Get me airspeed!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The pilot and copilot slam the throttle levers forward an

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The FUSION ENGINES BLAZE, thrusting the shuttle forward. still falls, its remaining lift fans screaming, until --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: IT'S CLIPPING the tree tops when it gets enough translati lift to fly and --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE PILOT PULLS back on the stick, lifting the nose.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're good!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BEHIND HIM, a surviving Na'vi hunter runs forward and --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THOONK!   ARROWHEADS sprout from the pilots' necks and ch

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE SHUTTLE CLIMBS out of control, at full acceleration. SLAMS into the underside of MONS Veritatis. It EXPLODES, hundreds of tons of flaming debris drop back into the for

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON THE FLIGHT DECK of the other SHUTTLE, the pilots watch wreckage falling.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Valkyrie Two is breaking off. And if any of ya'll want to get off this piece of shit planet, you better cover our ass, `cause we're the only way back to orbit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Roger that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FROM THE DRAGON COCKPIT Quaritch watches the shuttle bank away, with most of the remaining gunships following.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get back here you worthless pukes!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are we breaking off?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quaritch draws his pistol.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do you think?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He is over the edge-- no logic in his brain now.   Only d

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Techs and troopers crowd around consoles, listening to al the yelling and confusion as they try to plot the disintegrating battle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in growing alarm) What the hell is going on out there?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Regular troopers and volunteers FLEE through the jungle, scrambling to board SAMSONS as they touch down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The pilot listens to comms from Hell's Gate.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir, all ground units are falling back to the LZ.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quaritch's jaw clenches.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stay on target.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mo'at LOOKS UP as the DRAGON appears over the trees like shadow of Death. Around her, the Na'vi mothers clutch the children to them. We see AKWEY'S BOY among them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quaritch sets the target cursor on the MOTHER TREE and wh we recognize is the ghostly figure of Mo'at.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Switch missiles. Arm all pods.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Arming.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's see what these blue bastards do when I bitch-slap their goddess.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: JAKE'S LEONOPTERYX drops toward the Dragon like a Mig 29. pulls out, skimming over the ship. Uncoupling, he rolls backward off his mount and --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: JAKE HITS, skidding, on the hull of the Dragon. He rolls his feet, already running as --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: QUARITCH sees the leonopteryx WHOOSH overhead and flap aw with no rider. He snap-looks aft to see --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: JAKE SPRINTING along the spine of the ship, yanking two grenades from his battle-harness, pulling the pins with h teeth, then --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: QUARITCH's hand shoots out and SLAMS the pilot's CYCLIC S hard over. THE DRAGON lurches sideways, rolling sharply w a ROAR of protesting rotors and --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: JAKE IS FLUNG off his feet. The grenades miss the TURBINE INTAKES. One bounces off the ship. The other lodges again a cowling and --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: JAKE SLIDES OFF the ship, falling as -- K-BLAM! The grena blows a two meter hole in the hull --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WHOOOSHH!   Pandoran air swirls inside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to the pilot) Put your mask on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quaritch leaps out of his seat, heading aft as --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: JAKE GRABS the edge of a weapons pod, his feet dangling o open space.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HOLDING HIS BREATH, Quaritch blows a RESCUE HATCH and lea outside. Jake sees him aim his massive PISTOL.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: K-WHAM! K-WHAM! Rounds clang next to Jake's head. He LETS plummeting into the trees --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jake plunges through jungle canopy. He catches a HUGE LEA as Neytiri taught him -- it bends down, breaking his fall

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HE LETS GO, dropping again only to catch ANOTHER LEAF, an then another, and --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WE RUSH DOWN with him through this green blur.   Jake dro the ground in a feral crouch. Unhurt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (into his headset) Quaritch is gonna take out the Well of Souls! He's got a clear shot. Hit him, anybody that can! Do it now!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: IN HER SAMSON Trudy Chacon is all business.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SHE BANKS hard, pulling g's, coming around on the Dragon. She pours on the coal and the Samson leaps forward, strai at the WARSHIP.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: QUARITCH, DRILLS a stream of tracers at her, tearing thro her canopy, ripping chunks off her fuselage.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: IN THE JUNGLE BELOW, Norm watches her kamikaze run --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (clipped, pilot-like) Norm, I love you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TRUDY DIVES, raking through treetops and then, at the las instant, YANKS BACK on the stick and --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE SAMSON leaps straight up and -- K-KRASH!! SHEARS OFF COCKPIT of the Dragon as --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: QUARITCH THROWS HIMSELF aft along the aisle and --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TRUDY'S SAMSON disintegrates, the wreckage burning as it tumbles into the jungle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MILES QUARITCH grips the bulkhead as he stares out the op front of the fuselage. Wind howls through wreckage where pilot used to be. The forest rushes up to meet him and --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE DRAGON CRASHES through splintering trees, IMPACTING i lake with a WHITE BLAST of water.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Norm takes a few steps and drops to his knees.    Implode grief.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON THE PLOTTING DISPLAY as Quaritch's TRANSPONDER ICON disappears.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dragon is down. It's off the board.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do you mean, off the board?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Selfridge is stunned.    Suddenly the ROAR of an ENGINE m them all look up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: OUTSIDE THE WINDOW, MAX sits in the cab of an enormous SL CUTTER. Max flips Selfridge the bird and pushes a lever forward --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh shit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Selfridge DIVES as --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: K-RASHHHHH! The SPINNING TEETH of the SLASH-CUTTER tear through the window in a blast of glass and lethal air. Al go off. The technicians dive for cover in a blizzard of glass and shredded debris.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The slash-cutter head pulls back, and AVATARS SCRAMBLE through the gaping hole into the Ops Center --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The TROOPERS look up to see blue giants aiming weapons do at them. The battle is over in seconds. The avatars are holding the Ops Center.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Selfridge lies there gasping, in his emergency mask.   In shock. How could this be happening?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE DRAGON lies half submerged. Out of the water FG, a sh rises -- a AMPSUIT. Inside -- MILES QUARITCH, his face bloody, his eyes burning.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He slogs out of the water, covered with mud, then strides into the forest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: QUARITCH'S AMPSUIT THUDS relentlessly through the jungle. sees something through the foliage ahead -- the SHACK.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: INSIDE THE SHACK Jake is oblivious under the link. Throug window we see Quaritch's AMPSUIT step into the clearing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: QUARITCH levels his GAU-90 at the shack. His finger goes the firing button--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WHAM!! A six-legged BLACK DEMON tackles him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quaritch pivots as he falls, FIRING the cannon. It misses Neytiri by inches. He grapples with the THANATOR as its razor claws SCREECH over his metal armor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE TITANS twist and struggle. QUARITCH UNLEASHES a long burst from the cannon. Rounds tear into the creature, whi SHRIEKS but --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NEYTIRI wills it to SMASH the cannon hard against a rock, tearing it loose from the `suit's hand but --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quaritch SLAMS the thanator back against a tree-trunk, al crushing Neytiri.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CLOSE ON one hydraulic hand, as it draws the `suit's KNIF and --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: QUARITCH TWISTS violently, ramming the knife up under the thanator's chest armor. The creature ROARS and Quaritch f on top of it, stabbing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: QUARITCH STABS DOWN AGAIN. The thanator slumps, pinning Neytiri's legs under its great bulk. She is trapped.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quaritch looks down at Neytiri. She glares back at him, panting, scared but defiant.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's all over Quaritch --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quaritch turns, seeing Jake DROPPING from a tree limb. Th `suit rises slowly, knife glinting in the morning sun.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nothing's over while I'm breathing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kinda hoped you'd say that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: QUARITCH SURGES forward. JAKE closes fast, snatching up t broken CANNON as --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quaritch SLASHES DOWN with the knife and Jake parries, blocking it with the cannon. He CLOSES faster than the su can move and --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: K-CRACK! -- SLAMS the end of the cannon into the canopy, crazing it with a web of cracks as QUARITCH SLICES air wi the huge knife. Jake ducks, coming up to meet the next sl and --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SMASHES the knife hand with the cannon once -- twice -- a -- in a furious attack -- knocking the knife flying.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: QUARITCH catches him with the other arm, hurling him away Jake rolls just before --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THUDDD! -- the massive foot stomps down where he just was scrambles up as Quaritch CHARGES and --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: JAKE DUCKS another round-house, LEAPING forward to smash canopy again -- then again -- until it is WHITE with crac Quaritch manages to GRAB the cannon barrel but --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: INSIDE THE COCKPIT, he sees nothing but the sun on the shattered glass. HE HURLS the cannon blindly, but Jake du The massive cylinder cartwheels toward the shack and --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FROM INSIDE we see it CRASH against pressure window, craz it but not penetrating. Jake's link sits just inside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: INSIDE THE COCKPIT, Quaritch yanks a yellow handle and --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: P-FOOM! -- the canopy BLOWS OFF, flying through the air. Quaritch can see again. He dons his breathing mask. Bends pick up his KNIFE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NEARBY NEYTIRI struggles furiously, trying to get her leg free from underneath three tons of thanator.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: QUARITCH, panting, glowers at Jake.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How does it feel to betray your own race?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then, inexplicably, he TURNS.   Walks away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FROM INSIDE the shack, we see him charge straight toward and --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CRASH! -- he puts his hydraulic fist right through the window. He is reaching inside for the Link when --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: JAKE HITS in a flying tackle with every ounce of force he has, knocking the ampsuit sideways and --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: JAKE REACHES around the suit, grabbing Quaritch's shoulde and, yanks him forward HARD, SMASHING his face into the e of the cockpit but --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: QUARITCH flings him off with a sweep of his arm, and Jake slams to the ground.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: INSIDE THE LINK Jake is holding his breath as the toxic Pandoran air swirls in. GAS ALARMS SHRIEK.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NEYTIRI shoves with one free leg, desperately trying to p her other leg out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE AMPSUIT charges, the knife flashing down and --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: JAKE just manages to catch it in both hands, but the forc the attack drives him to his knees as --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: QUARITCH pushes the knife down inexorably, until Jake is pinned against a rock, the blade now inches from his thro

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: INSIDE THE LINK Jake is straining to stay conscious, to s connected as --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE KNIFE reaches his throat as --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THWAP! AN ARROW APPEARS in Quaritch's chest.   He looks u

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NEYTIRI STANDS -- a FURY released. A classic archer figur she NOCKS another arrow. Then draws and releases smoothly

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TH-WHAP! The machine TOPPLES off Jake and lies still.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: QUARITCH STARES at the two arrows in his chest. He touche the feathers of the ancient weapon, then -- with an ironi laugh -- he dies.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NEYTIRI runs up, another arrow nocked, bow drawn. Seeing Quaritch, she lowers her father's bow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: JAKE sees her, then goes limp, his eyes rolling back, and

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HUMAN JAKE EXPLODES out of the Link, slamming to the floo where he gags for breath. With his last strength, he claw toward an emergency breathing mask -- across the room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He scrambles toward it, on the edge of unconsciousness.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NEYTIRI VAULTS through the shattered window, landing in t debris like a cat. She GRABS the mask and flashes to Jake side -- puts the mask over his face and --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: JAKE drags in breath after breath. He looks up at Neytiri studying him as she holds him -- seeing his human body fo the first time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jake touches her face, his pale human hand against the bl of her skin. There eyes meet across the glass of the mask together, separate. Worldless.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MO'AT tends to the mortally wounded TSU'TEY as AVATAR JAK arrives with Neytiri. Mo'at has bound his wounds, but by expression, it is clear he cannot be saved.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jake kneels and Tsu'tey opens his eyes.   Through a haze pain, he recognizes Jake.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (NA'VI) I See you, Jakesully.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I See you, Tsu'tey te Rongloa Ateyitan.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are the people safe?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're safe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tsu'tey weakly clutches his severed queue.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can never ride again, or bond with my woman -- or hear the voice of Eywa. I can not lead the People. You will lead them, Jakesully.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. I'm not officer material.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It is decided. Now do the duty of Olo'eyctan. Set my spirit free.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not killing you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I am already dead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It is the way. And it is good. I will be remembered --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tsu'tey's voice is weak, but thick with emotion.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -- I fought with Toruk Macto, we were brothers -- and he was my last shadow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TSU'TEY'S HAND clasps with Jake's in a fierce grip. Jake draws his knife.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TSU'TEY'S POV -- Jake leans forward, blocking the sun. HIS SHADOW falls across Tsu'tey.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (NA'VI) Forgive me, my Brother. Go now to the Mother Spirit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: By his movement, we know that he has ended Tsu'tey's pain Jake's eyes well with tears as he continues reciting the prayer for the dead, and his Na'vi words carry over as we

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Na'vi ride direhorses among the abandoned machines of Hel Gate.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Banshees roost on the roofs of the modules, and stingbats flutter about, unimpeded. The SENTRY GUNS are silent, and the GATES are open to the forest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A few chose to stay. Fewer were chosen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Max, Norm, and a few of the avatars hold AR's as the personnel of Hell's Gate file up the cargo ramp of the remaining shuttle. The evicted humans are sullen and angr like POW's.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: JAKE and NEYTIRI stand together, watching the departure o the Sky People.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PARKER SELFRIDGE shuffles up the ramp. His eyes -- the ey of a lost soul -- meet JAKE'S. He disappears into the shi

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ISV VENTURE STAR hangs suspended against the dark side of PANDORA. The ISV's antimatter engines BLAZE to life and i accelerates out of orbit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What remains IN FRAME is a virgin, primeval world. Spanni the black continents is a vast reticulated lace-work of BIOLUMINESCENCE -- a ghostly WEB connecting all of Pandor

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The sun's rays shaft down through the layers of canopy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The forest will heal, and so will the hearts of the People. New life keeps the energy flowing, like the breath of the world.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NEYTIRI, obviously pregnant, is bow-fishing in the shallo Children jump and squeal with laughter in the river.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is my last videolog.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VIDEO IMAGE -- Jake sits in a chair, talking straight TO CAMERA. He is thin, pale. He looks around the high tech r

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The science guys will keep the lights on, here. But I won't miss this place.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE WILLOWS glow softly. The entire Omaticaya clan is gathered, seated in a prayer circle around the Mother Tre

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I better wrap this up. There's a funeral tonight, and I don't want to be late. It was someone very close to me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WIDE SHOT, moving in across the concentric rings of peopl all plugged-in and softly chanting. MOVING toward the center, over the figure of Mo'at, to hover above --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NEYTIRI, kneeling beside two FIGURES on the dais --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: JAKE and his AVATAR lie head to head. Human Jake is weari an exomask. Both figures are still, hands folded, covered translucent silken shrouds of ROOT-CILIA.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CAMERA CLOSES IN as Neytiri removes the mask from Jake's human face. She gently closes his dead eyes with her fingertips. Then bends and kisses him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MOVE INTO CU on AVATAR JAKE as Neytiri's hand comes into frame, stroking his cheek. TIGHTENING slowly to--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ECU JAKE'S EYES. Hold a beat, then --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They open.
